name: ManaimArt Museum
description:
We live in a virtual world a "Metaverse", the NFTs are an expression of modern art in this Metaverse, that's why I decided to create this virtual art museum.

I hope you enjoy your tour.

Controls:

MOVE

LOOK        ACTION       

  • No download required.
  • No need to open any type of account.
  • It does not ask for keywords from your wallet.
  • It does not ask for the address of your wallet .

Just click to play and enjoy.

In the game you can click on the pictures and choose to visit the collection in opensea or visit the asset. You can also follow my social networks as an artist in the game and here.

Discord: http://discord.gg/faURhcZ9rc
